entry.title: African Continent - Ben Heine
entry.summary:
Vendor: acmesupplier
Type:
Price: 49.00 - 499.00 (8 variants)

OUR PRINTS

We employ the use of UL Certified Greenguard Gold Ink for every print which provides not only a great quality pigment but also makes the canvas; water, fade, scratch and crack resistant. We produce perfect genuine artist quality canvas.

OUR STRETCHER BARS

We use 1.25' thick FSC Certified warp-free, knot-free, kiln-dried wood from sustainable forests. The frames are finger-jointed for better strength. Every canvas is ready to hang with metal sawtooth hangers and rubber bumpers for a smooth fit on your wall.

OUR FLOATING FRAMES

Our Roma Mouldings are made from 100% real pine wood, professionally handcrafted in Italy. Every frame is sanded five times to ensure a perfect finish without chipping. Matte black finish.
